#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
    ll t,d,i;
    string s1,s2;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>s1>>s2>>d;
        ll a[26]={0},b[26]={0};
        ll s=0;
        for(i=0;i<s1.length();i++)
        {
            a[s1[i]-97]++;
        }
        for(i=0;i<s2.length();i++)
        {
            b[s2[i]-97]++;
        }
        for(i=0;i<26;i++)
        {
            if(a[i]>b[i])
                s+=a[i]-b[i];
            else
                s+=b[i]-a[i];
        }
        if(s>d)
            cout<<"NO\n";
        else
            cout<<"YES\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
